function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Screening for individuals not wearing facial masks","Impact":"Failure to identify individuals without masks could lead to the spread of contagious diseases such as COVID-19","Mitigation":"Regular system checks and updates, along with human oversight and intervention, can reduce the risk of missed detections","Technologies":"Facial recognition software, GPS tracking, SMS alerts","People":"Public and authorities in charge of public health","Owner":"Developers and authorities in charge of public health"},{"Description":"Overfitting in the training data","Impact":"Could lead to inaccurate identification of individuals without masks, impacting the effectiveness of the system","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and adjustment of the model, using techniques like dropout and data augmentation","Technologies":"Machine learning algorithms, data augmentation","People":"Developers and data scientists","Owner":"Developers and data scientists"},{"Description":"Fluctuating testing loss and decrease in prediction confidence","Impact":"Unreliable detection of individuals without masks, leading to potential misclassifications and false alerts","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and recalibration of the model, use of ensemble methods for predictions","Technologies":"Machine learning algorithms, ensemble methods","People":"Developers and data scientists","Owner":"Developers and data scientists"}]}
